text:
```
**Bot.GG**
 Welcome to the Bot.GG help system
 ----------
 All commands are prefaced by a greater than symbol (>) and must be
 written in lower case E.G >help would bring up this help menu.

 >help
 >kick :- Kicks the mentioned user
 >purge :- Placing a number after this will clear that many messages (no
 number given clears 100)
 >announce :- Announces the user input
 >add :- Adds together multiple numbers
 >subtract :- Subtracts multiple numbers
 >multiply :- Multiplies multiple numbers
 >divide :- Divides multiple numbers
 >dice :- Rolls two D6 dice and provides you with the total
 >strat :- In bot version of Strat Roullete for CS:GO
```
